body:
#### PR description:

These are meant to convert segmentation faults into asserts and help guarantee geometry descriptions are consistent. Also fixed some naming inconsistencies.

#### PR validation:

Workflow 34034.0 are triggering these asserts (rather than sometimes triggering a segmentation fault).

resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1419
title: More asserts on geometry for HGCal
